data.title: 2023 Best in Business Awards
data.meta_description: Congratulations to our 2023 honorees! The Best in Business Awards attracted 1,103 entries from 181 news organizations, ranging from international, national and regional news outlets to specialized business publications. Press release Judges’ comments List of judges View SABEW Best in Business past honorees Banking/Finance Large division Winner – A collaboration…
data.text:
Congratulations to our 2023 honorees! The Best in Business Awards attracted 1,103 entries from 181 news organizations, ranging from international, national and regional news outlets to specialized business publications.

Press release

Judges’ comments

List of judges

View SABEW Best in Business past honorees

Banking/Finance

Large division

Winner – A collaboration of International Consortium of Investigative Journalists, OCCRP and Paper Trail Media; Cyprus Confidential
